features: Touch-screen smartphone/GPS padded compartment: Protects and safely holds your device while allowing its use on-the-go
Magnetic lid closure: Quick and easy one-hand access
Convenient large compartment with an elastic band, two mesh pockets and a key hook: Organizes and keeps your stuff in place
Three adjustable hook and loop straps: Fits all types and sizes of stems and tubes
Micro-adjustable rail system: Offers better adjustment and stability
Anti-slip fabric under bag and straps: Better stability
Reflective logos: Enhance visibility for maximum safety
Fits iPhone 6 Plus and other large screen smartphones
Size (L x H x D): 7" x 3.5" x 3.75" / 18 x 9 x 9.5 cm
